src:
蔡依林撩王俊凱不嘴軟　遭鐵粉狠嗆：給我注意點！
07 Nov 2019, 01:14 by 娛樂組
女星蔡依林1日赴北京擔任「TFBOYS」成員王俊凱的演唱會特別嘉賓，昨日王俊凱原本想赴蔡依林微博上留言表達感謝之意，卻慘吃閉門羹，只好在自己微博上留言感謝。蔡依林得知後也隨即轉發，還不忘再展撩功，被王俊凱鐵粉指名道姓直嗆：「蔡依林你給我注意點！」
說到中國大陸最火紅的男子團體，絕對非「TFBOYS」莫屬，成員之一的王俊凱本月1日舉行演唱會，特地找來天后蔡依林站台當嘉賓。兩人不僅攜手合唱新歌《心引力》，蔡依林還在舞台上當著台下所有粉絲撩起了王俊凱「姐弟戀行嗎？」，讓王俊凱當場臉紅心跳，傻笑說：「我覺得愛情不分年齡。」聽到這個答案，也讓Jolin大讚直呼：「你太可愛了！」


蔡依林1日赴北京為王俊凱演唱會站台。（翻攝自蔡依林臉書）



蔡依林撩弟不嘴軟踩粉絲地雷遭嗆。（翻攝自王俊凱微博）

昨日王俊凱特地在微博上貼文感謝蔡依林當天到場支持，也不忘抱怨了一下Jolin，「謝謝Jolin姐來演唱會，你是當天的驚喜。姐姐的微博需要關注100天才能評論⋯被拒得有點酷。」隨後引來Jolin轉發，並再現撩功，「誰可忍心狠心拒絕我家狂野型男」，並邀約下次再一起跳舞，讓雙方粉絲大喊「好甜！」、「根本是神仙組合」，不過也意外引發王俊凱鐵粉醋意，留言直嗆：「蔡依林你給我注意點！怎麼就你家的了！」
更新時間｜2019.11.07 03:10
text:
Jolin Tsai, Wang Junkai is not soft, but I am paying attention to it!
07 Nov 2019, 01:14 by Entertainment Group
Actress Cai Yilin went to Beijing as a special guest of Wang Junkai, a member of "TFBOYS" on the 1st. Yesterday, Wang Junkai originally wanted to go to Cai Yilin's Weibo to express his gratitude, but he was so sad that he had to leave a message on his Weibo. After Cai Yilin learned it, he immediately forwarded it. He did not forget to show his work again. He was named by Wang Junkai Iron Powder: "Cai Yilin, you pay attention to me!"
Speaking of the most popular men's group in mainland China, it is definitely not "TFBOYS". One of the members, Wang Junkai, held a concert on the 1st of this month, and specially found the Tianzhu Jolin Tsai as a guest. The two men not only joined hands to sing a new song "Heart Gravity", Jolin Tsai was on the stage, in front of all the fans, Wang Junkai "Sister and brother love?", Wang Junkai blushing on the spot, smirked: "I think love regardless of age Hearing this answer, Jolin also praised: "You are so cute!"


Jolin Tsai went to Beijing on the 1st to be the Wang Junkai concert platform. (Reviewed from Jolin Tsai Facebook)



Jolin Tsai’s younger brother is not soft on the fans’ mines. (Reviewed from Wang Junkai Weibo)

Yesterday, Wang Junkai posted a message on Weibo to thank Jolin Tsai for his support on the same day. I also forgot to complain about Jolin. "Thank you Jolin for coming to the concert. You are the surprise of the day. My sister's Weibo needs to pay attention to 100 days to comment. ⋯ was rejected a bit cool.” Then Jolin forwarded and reappeared, “Who can bear to reject my wild man?” and invited to dance again next time, let the fans yell “Good sweet!” "It is a combination of gods and gods," but it also unexpectedly triggered Wang Junkai's iron powder and vinegar. The message was straightforward: "Cai Yilin, you pay attention to me! How is your home!"
Update time|2019.11.07 03:10
